content:
four new recruits signed with the University of Colorado mens golf team PERIOD For Head Coach Roy Edwards it was the first chance for him to go through a full recruiting process as he was brought on as head coach in July  PERIOD

Signing letters of intent were Johnny Widmer of the Cayman Islands Kevin Kring from Springfield Mo. josh Creel from Cheyenne Wyo. and Jason Burstyn from Miami Fla PERIOD

These are four guys that really want to be here and I think that with some hard work they can really be contributors for us for the next couple of years Edwards said PERIOD

Widmer has played internationally five times for the Cayman Islands Mens Team PERIOD  Ranked as the No PERIOD  junior in the GolfweekTitleist rankings Widmer was a Caribbean Junior Championships honorable mention winner in both  and  PERIOD  He was the Cayman Islands Mens Champion in   and  PERIOD

He fell in love with Boulder right away Edwards said PERIOD

Kring was rated No PERIOD  in the GolfweekTitleist rankings and No PERIOD  in the American Junior Golf Association this summer PERIOD  He set the Missouri state high school record for low score with a  and had a . scoring average throughout his high school career PERIOD

If we want to be really good next year Kevin and the three others are going to have to have an immediate impact Edwards said PERIOD

Creel finished second in the Wyoming state meet as a senior positing a two round score of  PERIOD  He had an impressive senior season scoring average of . and was a first team allstate performer three of his four high school years PERIOD

Burstyn was ranked No PERIOD  in the GolfweekTitleist rankings PERIOD  With an even par . scoring average in high school he had many top amateur finishes PERIOD  Burstyn was named to the  and  Miami Herald AllDade County golf teams PERIOD

Perhaps one of the strongest classes in recent history Edwards said he is optimistic with his teams current status PERIOD

You never know how good a recruiting class is until they graduate but these are four good players and good students  they have the whole package Edwards said PERIOD
